00014 BehaviorCollection::BehaviorCollection() : m_uiCurPos(0)
00015 {
00016         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew Arrival());
00017         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew Departure());
00018         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew Seek());
00019         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew Flee());
00020         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew Wander());
00021         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew Separation());
00022         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew Alignment());
00023         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew Cohesion());
00024         
00025         // flocking behavior
00026         list<BehaviorPtr> vFlocking;
00027         vFlocking.push_back(NiNew Cohesion());
00028         vFlocking.push_back(NiNew Alignment());
00029         vFlocking.push_back(NiNew Separation());
00030         vFlocking.push_back(NiNew Wander());
00031 
00032         list<float> vFlockingCoef;
00033         vFlockingCoef.push_back(1.0f);
00034         vFlockingCoef.push_back(4.0f);
00035         vFlockingCoef.push_back(5.0f);
00036         vFlockingCoef.push_back(5.0f);
00037 
00038         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew BehaviorCombo("Flocking", vFlocking, vFlockingCoef));
00039 
00040         // arrive, wander and separate behavior
00041         list<BehaviorPtr> vAWS;
00042         vAWS.push_back(NiNew Arrival());
00043         vAWS.push_back(NiNew Wander());
00044         vAWS.push_back(NiNew Separation());
00045 
00046         list<float> vAWSCoef;
00047         vAWSCoef.push_back(1.0f);
00048         vAWSCoef.push_back(1.5f);
00049         vAWSCoef.push_back(5.0f);
00050 
00051         m_vBehaviors.push_back(NiNew BehaviorCombo("Arrive, Wander & Separate", vAWS, vAWSCoef));
00052 
00053 }

00055 BehaviorCollection::~BehaviorCollection()
00056 {
00057         for (unsigned int i=0; i<m_vBehaviors.size(); i++)
00058         {
00059                 m_vBehaviors[i] = 0;
00060         }
00061         m_vBehaviors.clear();
00062 }
00063 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 BehaviorPtr BehaviorCollection::GetNext() 
00065 {
00066         size_t size = m_vBehaviors.size();
00067         if (size == 0) 
00068         {
00069                 return 0;
00070         }
00071         m_uiCurPos = (m_uiCurPos + 1)%size;
00072         return m_vBehaviors[m_uiCurPos];
00073 
00074 }
